Record.ClassificationPath: Nutritional and Metabolic Diseases/Nutrition Disorders/Malnutrition/Deficiency Diseases/Avitaminosis/Vitamin B Deficiency/Pellagra
Record.Description: A disease due to deficiency of NIACIN, a B-complex vitamin, or its precursor TRYPTOPHAN. It is characterized by scaly DERMATITIS which is often associated with DIARRHEA and DEMENTIA (the three D's).
